esrb.synopsis: This is a hidden-object game in which players assume the role of a detective tasked with finding a missing journalist in an abandoned amusement park. Players solve puzzles and search through screens of jumbled objects to advance the storyline. Some sequences contain dark imagery: a shackled character tied to a chair, a pentagram next to a doll embedded with needles. Newspaper clippings sometimes reference deadly events: "Several Die in Rollercoaster Catastrophe" and "A worker . . . was knocked unconscious as he fell into the pond, and drowned." During the course of the game, a handful of tobacco-related products (e.g., cigars, smoking pipes) are included as searchable items. The word "damned" appears in the dialogue.
